data.Name: Mägo de Oz
data.Bio: The band was founded in May 1989 by the drummer, who slowly recruited the rest of his members for the band and by 1992 had a lineup. Originally, the band was called "Transilvania" (Transylvania in Spanish) named after the metallic instrumental piece of the same name from their idols, Iron Maiden. In 1992 the band members were: * Txus: Drums and backing vocals * Mohamed: Violin * Charlie: Lead Guitar * Chema: Rhythm Guitar * Salva: Bass Read more on Last.fm
